name: The Storm Diver
description:
The Storm Diver is the beginning of a larger project. I created this game from scratch for TigerJ(am) 2 aka TigerJam 2019 Check out all the games for this jam here: https://itch.io/jam/tigerjam-2

I made everything except the lightning sound which is available from freesound.org https://freesound.org/people/Turrus/sounds/242048/ I use unity and aseprite to create the rest of this game.

There will be updates to this project. I over scoped and ran into some real life issues during the jam. I am excited to update this game and make it what I originally envisioned.

Thanks for checking it out :)
